text: We learned early on about your connection

enemies, I guess.

What was your job description?
She needed help at the time with...
honestly her life.

Like I would go and get her groceries.
I would make sure that she was on time to
her freaking meetings.
And- Was this,
Was she filming the show at this point?
Um, I think you guys filmed season one.
Okay. Was she paying you?
No.

Why? Yeah. Honestly,

and look where it got her. And I'll start out

I actually.
